aether.pro_tips.line.aether.golden_oak_a: Gilded Skyroot trees yield valuable Golden Amber in their logs.
lore.block.aether.golden_oak_leaves: These golden Leaves generate with Gilded Skyroot trees. They spawn golden particles in a radius of 5 blocks. They yield Gilded Skyroot Saplings when decayed.
lore.block.aether.golden_oak_sapling: These large saplings when planted will grow into huge Gilded Skyroot trees! You can use Bone Meal to speed up the process.
lore.item.aether.golden_amber: These round golden orbs can be obtained by mining Gilded Skyroot Logs with a Gravitite Axe. Their main purpose is to craft Golden Darts, and Dart Shooters.
lore.item.aether.gravitite_axe: Part of Aether's best tool tier, this Axe not only can make wood blocks float, but it can mine Gilded Skyroot logs for Golden Amber!
lore.block.aether.carved_slab: Crafted from Sentry Stone. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether.carved_stairs: Crafted from Sentry Stone. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether.carved_wall: Crafted from Sentry Stone. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether.sentry_stone: The Light version of Sentry Stone, also found in Bronze Dungeons.
lore.item.deep_aether.goldenleaf_berries: A berry from the quicksoil-inhabiting Brettl plant, these little red fruits are quite sweet.
gui.aether.slider.message.attack.invalid: §7§oHmm. It's a rock-solid block. That doesn't seem to hurt it. Maybe I should use my pickaxe?§r
